description:
PTM-Psi is a Python 3 package that combines several capabilities to streamline the workflow to interrogate the impact of
PTMs on proteins using well-established software packages. The workflow of the PTM-Psi software package includes
input files and launch instances from standard packages such as AlphaFold, NWChem, GROMACS, and the Autodock
Suite
name: pnnl/PTMPSI
